bug.author: zainarbani
bug.description:
Describe the bug The latest version of cipheycore on Termux is 0.1.0, but ciphey requires 0.2.9 or higher. To Reproduce Steps to reproduce the behavior:
pip install ciphey --upgrade pip install cipheycore==0.2.9
Versions:
OS/Distro: Linux arm64, Android 10 (Termux) Python version: 3.8.2
<denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/31644731/89686278-481cfd00-d928-11ea-94ad-15f4dd4ba94b.jpg></denchmark-link>

comments.comment: Issue-Label Bot is automatically applying the label bug to this issue, with a confidence of 0.96. Please mark this comment with üëç or üëé to give our bot feedback! Links: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/marketplace/issue-label-bot>app homepage</denchmark-link> , <denchmark-link:https://mlbot.net/data/Ciphey/Ciphey>dashboard</denchmark-link> and <denchmark-link:https://github.com/hamelsmu/MLapp>code</denchmark-link> for this bot.

We do not currently have an android build of cipheycore (the C++ library that does the more intensive tasks). However, you can build your own one using the documentation here (freshly created for this issue).

Thanks for your response, I will try it.
